Shawn Radcliffe is a science writer and yoga teacher in Ontario, Canada. His work has appeared in print and digital publications, including Healthline, Mindbodygreen, Science & Nonduality, and others. Originally from New Hampshire, Shawn lived in Philadelphia and Portland, Oregon, before trading in the big city for small-town living. When he’s not reading or writing, Shawn is often backpacking, bicycling, or wandering the streets of a new city. Connect with him on Twitter.

Education

  • Missouri State University, BS
  • Cox College, MS
  • Currently pursuing additional training in functional nutrition through the Integrative and Functional Nutrition Academy

Certifications

  • Certified LEAP Therapist (CLT)

Affiliations

  • Nutritionist Answers
